# electricitymapsr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

electricitymapsr is a R API wrapper for electricitymaps

## Installation

You can install the development version of electricitymapsr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("andypicke/electricitymapsr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(electricitymapsr)
## basic example code
```
